quotes.quote: The best blood will at some time get into a fool or a mosquito.
A man who is good enough to shed his blood for the country is good enough to be given a square deal afterwards.
Blood alone moves the wheels of history.
We are linked by blood, and blood is memory without language.
It will have blood, they say; blood will have blood.
Blood is that fragile scarlet tree we carry within us.
Blood is a cleansing and sanctifying thing, and the nation that regards it as the final horror has lost its manhood.
The blood of the martyrs is the seed of the church.
The patriot's blood is the seed of Freedom's tree.
It is said that blood is thicker than water. It is what joins us, binds us, curses us.
Everybody is a book of blood; wherever we're opened, we're red.
When the blood burns, how prodigal the soulLends the tongue vows.
All the soarings of my mind begin in my blood.
